content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to current, real-time data or future plans. However, KTH's sustainability initiatives show that the university is committed to promoting sustainable development both locally and globally. KTH has a strong international presence, and the university is actively engaged in sustainability partnerships with companies and institutions around the world. For example, KTH collaborates with international organizations such as the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) and the International Energy Agency (IEA) to promote sustainable development goals globally. The university also has research and education collaborations with universities and institutions in various parts of the world, providing opportunities for KTH students and faculty to engage in global sustainability initiatives. Given this evidence, it is likely that KTH will continue to develop sustainable partnerships and initiatives, both locally and globally, to promote sustainable development and tackle pressing global challenges.
